welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rustington, a charming seaside town known for its picturesque beaches and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and charm that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the larger of the two terminals and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly European and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
